text: ‘‘Isra'ilara santatigale, nanu nim'ma balige allahana dutanagi bandiruttene. Nim'ma bali igagale iruva tauratannu nanu samarthisuttene. Mattu nanu, nanna balika baraliruva ahmad emba hesarina dutara kuritu subhavarte niduvavanagiruttene’’ endu maryamara putra isa heliddaru. Konege avaru (a dutaru) spasta puravegalondige avara balige bandaga avaru idella spasta matagarikeyagide endu bittaru
